Events that occurred on 8 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letters 176 and 177.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Anthony Roberts.
1976 - Actor Dominic Monaghan is born.
2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
